sentences.en: A good accountant can analyze an unprofitable operation quickly.
sentences.cn: 一名优秀的会计师能迅速分析出亏损的环节.

sentences.en: After John found farming unprofitable, he moved to town and turned his hand to carpentry.
sentences.cn: 约翰发现务农无利可图后, 他就搬到城里开始做木匠.

sentences.en: Everything here has gone flat and unprofitable.
sentences.cn: 这儿的一切都既平淡又无聊.

sentences.en: He volunteered for the hard and unprofitable job.
Regardless of the moral issue, dishonesty in advertising has proved very unprofitable.
sentences.cn: 即使不斟酌道德因素, 不老实的广告也被证实无利可图.

sentences.en: Speculation as to the desirability of this process is an unprofitable pastime.
sentences.cn: 猜测这一进程有何可取之处是无益之举.

sentences.en: The company president decided to pull the plug the unprofitable Internet division.
sentences.cn: 该公司总裁决定要停掉不赚钱的网路部门.

sentences.en: The day had been both unprofitable and unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 这一天过得既无聊又没趣.
今天是劳而无功的一天，令人十分沮丧。

sentences.en: This is an unprofitable discussion. Our standpoints are too different.
sentences.cn: 这是一种无益的讨论. 我们的立场太不一样了.

sentences.en: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress and tall, but bears no fruit.
sentences.cn: 无益的雄辩如同高大的柏树, 不会结果.

sentences.en: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress, which is great and tall, but bears no fruit.
sentences.cn: 无益的雄辩犹如柏树, 虽然高大但不结果.

sentences.en: Unprofitable ones will occupy a predominant position in the medical service system.
sentences.cn: 非营利性医疗机构在医疗服务体系中占主导地位.

sentences.en: Wales unattractive and Scotland unprofitable, so the legions rarely went there.
sentences.cn: 威尔士缺乏吸引力,苏格兰又无利可图, 因此罗马军团很少进驻这两个地区.

sentences.en: We decide to cut out all the unprofitable projects.
sentences.cn: 我们决定撤掉所有不盈利的项目.

words.tran_cn: 无利可图地；徒劳无益地；赚不到钱地

trans.tran_cn: 无利益的，没有用的，无益
